content.description: Sit start with a left hand hueco and a right hand undercling. From there, move to a left hand crimp, follow to a right hand pocket, and gain the rail and the bumps above to reach an easy finish.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Moonshine.

content.description:
Start on the left side of the huge hueco that

Helmet of Vader

and

Stratagem

start on. Move out to a positive hueco, match and move out of the roof via a small three finger crimp and a big cross with the right hand to a positive hold on top of the roof. Make the easy topout.
content.location: This is located on the far left side of the roof on Moonshine Boulder. You can downclimb any number of ways.

content.description:
Sit start with hands matched on a large, positive hueco. From there, work out the overhang on a superb undercling.  Once at lip, continue straight upward using a series of crimps and rails which lead to a hueco and the eventual topout.

Getting over the lip to the slab can be awkward.
content.protection: Pad or two, landing is great though.
content.location:
This ascends the center of Moonshine Boulder's north-face. It uses the same start as

Helmet of Vader

.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on a juggy rail. From there, move to the hueco, which then sets up a fun move to the lip. At the lip, work up and over slightly right to top it out.
content.location: This ascends the Northwest corner of the Moonshine Boulder.

content.description:
Sit start far left, and traverse across and up to end on the far right. It may be a little contrived, but it is a fun, long, moderate warm-up.

It is possible to "escape" anywhere mid-traverse for an easier variation.
Sit start with hands matched on a large, positive hueco. From there, work out the overhang on a superb undercling.  Once at the lip, move slightly left, pull over the lip, and walk up the remainder.
content.protection: A pad or two, the landing is great though.
content.location: Helmet of Vader starts almost directly in the middle of Moonshine Boulder's north-face overhang. It has the same start as the Stratagem problem.

content.description:
The landing is great throughout, the rock is good, and the movement is interesting.

Sit start way under the roof matched on an east facing jug with a left heel hook and a right foot toe hooking the outside arete. From there, move through a jug, cross to the arete, and continue following the arete to link up to

Plastic Space

and an easy finish up the featured arete.
content.protection: Pads aren't really necessary. The landing is perfect, and the climbing for most of the problem is no more than a foot off the ground. If you use them, thinner will work better.
content.location: It climbs out the roof on the west side of Moonshine's north face.
